SELECT f.facilityID, f.image, f.minclassname, f.facName, f.place FROM facilitytbl f JOIN ( SELECT MIN(facilityID) as facilityID, place FROM facilitytbl GROUP BY place ORDER BY facilityID LIMIT 5 ) sub ON f.facilityID = sub.facilityID
